# claude:doc:load

Charge la documentation Claude Code depuis docs.claude.com dans des fichiers markdown locaux

---

**IMPORTANT**: Use the Skill tool to invoke the skill `claude:doc:load` without arguments.

Execute the skill immediately. Do not explain or describe what you will do - just invoke the skill using the Skill tool.

Once fixed, this workaround can be removed.
